channel.title: Just thought I'd introduce myself
channel.description:
Hello all,
My name is Iziah. Im 20 years old. I am a huge gamer and today I've decided to learn how to develop my own games. I decided to start here because I figured going through a private server's source code could help me understand programming a little better. Anyways, I only really play CoD games (they are the only ones I actually own), I have CoD 4: Modern Warfare, CoD: World at War, CoD: Modern Warfare 2, CoD: Black Ops, and CoD: Modern Warfare 3 all on my 3DS. My goal is to work my way up to creating a game semi like CoD. I know it will take tons of time, and I am just using Java as a base. Anyways hope to get to know you all better!

item.title: Just thought I'd introduce myself
item.dc:creator: @MW3_Man MW3 Man
item.description:
@MW3_Man wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:41, topic:436904"][quote author=youridudock link=topic=539618.msg3950584#msg3950584 date=1332254368]

Anyone who plays COD is not a gamer… in fact you’re the farthest person from gamer.

I play cod, Battlefield, uncharted, etc. Does that mean that I am not a gamer? -.-
[/quote]
If you’ve mastered 10+ games, including single player and classics(N64, PS1 etc games), you can be called a gamer, unless you don’t fit in my description, you are just another newfag who thinks playing FPS’s makes you a pro gamer…sigh[/quote]Oh ok then I’m covered. I’ve played and beaten so many game growing up lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Just thought I'd introduce myself
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

reyx7:

Anyone who plays COD is not a gamer… in fact you’re the farthest person from gamer.

[quote=“Dictionary.com”]noun
a person who plays games, especially computer or video games.[/quote]

Urbandictonary:

Any person who plays video games for a hobby. You have your recreational gamer who plays games only once or twice a week. You have your typical gamer who plays games once every day or every other day for a couple hours. Then you have the uber-gamers who dedicate their life to playing video games, either because of an unhealthy addiction or something job related.

OT: Welcome to Moparscape where the troll rules over everyone…

Read full topic
